flow.descriptionCdata:
24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.0148c497-eea0-42be-95ff-6e56ec7bf5d9.description=Revert a virtual machine to an existing named snapshot or the most current one if none specified. Inputs\: host - VMWare host hostname or IP user - VMWare username password - VMWare user's password port - Port to connect on protocol - Connection protocol (http or https) async - Asynchronously perform the task taskTimeOut - Time to wait before the operation is considered to have failed (seconds) virtualMachine - Primary Virtual Machine identifier. IP (IPv4 or IPv6 depending upon ESX version), hostname (full), inventorypath (Datacenter/vm/MyResourcePool/MyVM), UUID, or the VM id (vm-123,123) vmIdentifierType - Virtual machine identifier type snapshotName - Name of snapshot Responses\: success - The operation completed successfully. failure - Something went wrong. Returns\: returnResult - Task ID or task completion return message 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.0ecf4690-31e2-4d59-b634-2bda041ecf47.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.10dcbe95-17eb-45f9-a042-4cc462d9008d.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.20bba159-b1a7-4784-b3d8-c1aa66f01f1a.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.2fb3fbef-e3ab-4f99-b27e-28707905ebc4.description=
Retrieve information about a virtual machine's snapshot. If name of snapshot not specified, returns the snapshot tree.

Inputs\:
host - VMWare host hostname or IP.
user - VMWare username.
password - VMWare user's password.
port - Port to connect on.
protocol - Connection protocol (http or https).
closeSession - Close the internally kept VMWare Infrastructure API session at completion of operation (true, false).
virtualMachine - Primary Virtual Machine identifier. Inventorypath (Datacenter/vm/Folder/MyVM), Name of VM, IP (IPv4 or IPv6 depending upon ESX version), hostname (full), UUID, or the VM id (vm-123,123).
vmIdentifierType - Virtual machine identifier type (inventorypath, name, ip, hostname, uuid, vmid).
snapshotName - Name of snapshot

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
returnResult - Task completion return message
snapshotInfo - Snapshot information.

Notes\:
Inventory Path Formatting\: If host is an ESX server inventory path will be\: ha-datacenter/vm/ .  If host is a vCenter the inventory path will be\: /vm// . The / part of the path is based on the "Virtual Machines & Templates" view in the vCenter client. The inventory path is case sensitive.
24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.38378f83-a193-4c63-ad0c-15f1ed91c6d6.description=
This operation checks whether a string matches another string, using a specific matching rule. The "toMatch" input is the string that is checked for matching the "matchTo" expression. 

Inputs\:
    matchType - The type of match to perform.
Valid values\: Exact Match, Contains, Contains Once, Does Not Contain, Match All Words, Match No Words, Regex
Default value\: Exact Match
    toMatch - The string that is checked for matching.
    matchTo - The string to match against.
Example\: If "matchType" is “RegEx”, the "matchTo" input is a regular expression such as\: ^-?\d+(([\.,]\d+)?)+$. 
    ignoreCase - Specifies whether to ignore case when matching or not.
Valid values\: False, True
Default value\: False

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the string "Matches" if the "toMatch" string matches the "matchTo" string. Otherwise, it contains the string "Does Not Match".  

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully.
24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.386abb05-247b-4292-acc9-00500f19dbcd.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.3ac7ee06-35c2-485f-8be8-bf959c17d671.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.437bb330-79e8-460b-979e-f092d6a089e3.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.554aece3-cdf0-4c14-9978-1d918b562254.prompt=${server.vmmp.host} 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.6739fca7-9f55-4f0c-938a-165cec149b02.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.97c4d5a2-d601-42ca-a7f6-4643bc4cbae1.prompt=Select from vm platforms 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.9bc04765-3afb-4ca3-9f4f-c97906e56040.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.a4269820-e408-4065-9859-a2a0859dd4e1.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.a621eef3-d56c-4a64-bf80-2252b429a4bd.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.b0847680-6d58-40b0-b4b6-dd9828cce207.description= The PowerOff should be a guest shutdown + power off, or there might be damage to the guest OS if power off abruptly. 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.f035b2c7-44d0-4a56-831f-1b20dbcaf468.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.fb711635-d24b-487d-87a8-6f948e0f634b.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.fc19776d-8f34-4bb5-99c4-ee85029b567b.description= The PowerOff should be a guest shutdown + power off, or there might be damage to the guest OS if power off abruptly. 24c9540c-7ef3-4012-ad01-56abdd36a4f1.ff0edf24-adfa-4efd-8e63-de3480419e05.description=
This operation checks whether a string matches another string, using a specific matching rule. The "toMatch" input is the string that is checked for matching the "matchTo" expression. 

Inputs\:
    matchType - The type of match to perform.
Valid values\: Exact Match, Contains, Contains Once, Does Not Contain, Match All Words, Match No Words, Regex
Default value\: Exact Match
    toMatch - The string that is checked for matching.
    matchTo - The string to match against.
Example\: If "matchType" is “RegEx”, the "matchTo" input is a regular expression such as\: ^-?\d+(([\.,]\d+)?)+$. 
    ignoreCase - Specifies whether to ignore case when matching or not.
Valid values\: False, True
Default value\: False

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the string "Matches" if the "toMatch" string matches the "matchTo" string. Otherwise, it contains the string "Does Not Match".  

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully.
flow.name: pc_lc_restore_snapshot

staticBinding.value: No virtual machine snapshot tree found
